name: Gran's Garden
description:
Welcome to Gran’s garden, how kind of you to offer to help! Gran just loves flowers and has a special knack for cross-breeding new varieties for sale at her stall. People come from all over to buy Gran’s flowers... and will often pay a very high price for special creations.

Who knows, if you do well Gran might give you a little extra pocket money for your help!

How to play
  • Plant flowers
  • Cross pollenate flowers to discover new varieties
  • Harvest flowers to sell at the markets
  • Set your own prices. (High prices have a lower chance of selling so be careful!)
  • Buy upgrades to your garden so you can plant more and more flowers
  • Get bonus cash for meeting customer requests!
From the Ants

Thanks for taking a look at our game, we are super proud of how it turned out.
